DOC.brief_summary: This observational study national cohort 600 Swedish PSC patient include yearly MR/MRCP , biobanking serum , plasma blood , followup clinical data ( intervention , symptom , lab , colonoscopy ) . The aim collect well characterize cohort PSC patient provide future possibility evaluate biomarkers prognosis early cancer detection .
DOC.brief_title: Surveillance Study Early Detection Cholangiocarcinoma ( CCA ) Primary Sclerosing Cholangitis ( PSC )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis PSC MR/MRCP Life expectancy > 1 year Informed consent Liver transplantation wait list Secondry SC Diagnosis CCA
